atk-abh03a57:2_1: uppādanatthāya parikammaṁ. Uppannassa pana vaḷañjanakāle parikammaṁ sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a57:3: 82. Ti tadārammaṇabhavaṅgamūlabhavaṅgānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ. Sesamettha sabbaṁ pāḷivaseneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a57:4_0: Dassanattike dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjatītiādīsu dassanena pahātabbo puthujjanassa
atk-abh03a57:4_1: uppajjati. Bhāvanāya pahātabbo sotāpannassāpīti evaṁ uparimassa uparimassa heṭṭhimā
atk-abh03a57:4_2: heṭṭhimā nuppajjantīti veditabbā. Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa
atk-abh03a57:4_3: dhammassa ekenapi paccayena paccayo na hoti. Sesamettha pāḷiṁ anugantvā kusalattike
atk-abh03a57:5_1: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Vicikicchuddhaccasahagato moho ahetukattā tatiyapade paviṭṭho.
atk-abh03a57:5_2: Evamettha yesaṁ dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbo hetu atthi, te pahātabbahetukā. Yesaṁ
atk-abh03a57:5_3: so natthi te nevadassanena nabhāvanāyapahātabbahetukāti imaṁ pahātabbahetukavibhāgaṁ
atk-abh03a57:5_4: ñatvā sesaṁ dassanenapahātabbattike ceva kusalattike ca dassitalakkhaṇānusāreneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a57:6: Ācayagāmittike ca paṭiccavārasaṁsaṭṭhavāresu anulomaṁ kusalattikasadisameva. Sesaṁ vissajjanato gaṇanato ca yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti.
atk-abh03a57:7_0: Sekkhattike asekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa na kenaci paccayena paccayo. Sekkho
atk-abh03a57:7_1: asekkhassa anantarapakatūpanissayo pana hoti. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti, tathā parittattike.
atk-abh03a57:8_1: vattuṁ vaṭṭati. Vipākānaṁ parittārammaṇānanti paṭisandhiyaṁ kammaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā,
atk-abh03a57:8_3: ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppannānaṁ. Ye pana “gotrabhucittena natthi paṭisandhī”ti vadanti,
atk-abh03a57:8_4: te iminā suttena paṭisedhetabbā. Sesamettha pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṁ. Hīnattiko saṅkiliṭṭhattikasadiso.
atk-abh03a57:9_0: Micchattattike micchattaniyato sammattaniyatassa, sammattaniyato vā micchattaniyatassa
atk-abh03a57:9_1: kenaci paccayena paccayo na hoti. Micchattaniyato vā sammattaniyato vā sahajātādhipatirahito
atk-abh03a57:9_2: nāma natthi. Sammattaniyate ekantato ārammaṇapurejātaṁ natthi, micchattaniyate siyā
atk-abh03a57:9_3: ārammaṇapurejātaṁ. Aniyataṁ cittaṁ ārabbha niyatā micchādiṭṭhi uppajjeyya. Sesā niyataṁ
atk-abh03a57:9_4: ārabbha niyataṁ nuppajjati, micchattaniyataṁ garuṁ katvā na koci dhammo uppajjati.
atk-abh03a57:9_5: Kusalo micchattassa upanissayapaccayo na hoti. Sesamettha pāḷiyaṁ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a57:10_0: Maggārammaṇattike paṭiccavārassa anulome vipākapaccayo natthi. Kammapaccayepi imasmiṁ
atk-abh03a57:10_1: tike nānākkhaṇikaṁ na labbhati, tathā uppannattikaatītattikesu. Paccanīye ahetukaṁ
atk-abh03a57:10_2: maggārammaṇanti ahetukaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ, āvajjanaṁ sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ. Sesamettha
atk-abh03a57:11_0: Uppannattike ca atītattike ca paṭiccavārādayo natthi, pañhāvāramattameva labbhati.
atk-abh03a57:11_1: Kasmā? Paṭiccavārādayo hi sahajātapurejātānaññeva honti. Ime ca tikā atītānāgatamissakā.
atk-abh03a57:11_2: Uppannattike cettha anantarabhāgiyāpi paccayā na labbhanti. Kasmā? Uppannattike atītassa
atk-abh03a57:11_3: abhāvato. Uppanno ca anuppanno cāti ime cettha dve dhammā uppannassa ca anuppannassa
atk-abh03a57:11_4: cāti imesaṁ dvinnaṁ na kenaci paccayena paccayo. Anuppanno ca uppādī cāti ime pana
atk-abh03a57:11_5: dve uppannassa ārammaṇūpanissayavasena dvīhi paccayehi paccayo. Sesamettha pāḷiyaṁ
atk-abh03a57:12_0: Atītattike paccuppannaṁ atītānāgatassa, atītānāgatañca atītānāgatassa na kenaci paccayena
atk-abh03a57:12_1: paccayo. Nibbānaṁ pana dvīsupi imesu tikesu neva paccayato na paccayuppannato labbhati.
atk-abh03a57:13_0: Ajjhattattike ajjhattabahiddhāpadaṁ na gahitaṁ. Ajjhattabahiddhāsaṅkhātā hi ubho
atk-abh03a57:13_1: rāsayo neva ekato paccayā honti, na paccayuppannā; tasmā hatthatale ṭhapitassa sāsapassa
atk-abh03a57:13_2: vaṇṇopi hatthatalavaṇṇena saddhiṁ ekato ārammaṇaṁ na hotīti veditabbo. Yathā ca ajjhattabahiddhāpadaṁ,
atk-abh03a57:13_3: evamettha ajjhattārammaṇattikepi ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇapadaṁ na labbhati. Sesaṁ
atk-abh03a57:14: Sanidassanattikepi pāḷivaseneva attho gahetabbo. Gaṇanāpettha pāḷiyaṁ āgatavāre saṅkhipitvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṁsandanesu saṁsanditvā veditabbāti.
